A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed this movie\, there were so many unexpected twists and surprises. I love how I came into this movie with so many questions then leave with none of them answered but not care (in a good way). Contrary to others opinions I liked Luke Skywalker struggling with his famous status as it created an interesting and original story line in the movie. However I feel like the movie could have been shorter. I wouldn't have mind if they shorten the casino planet side plot as it barely contributed to the main story line and was slightly boring. Overall I expected a movie following the same plot of Empires Strikes Back but it turned out to be totally bold and original leaving me wondering how the saga continues.
